title: Project Scoping - Firewall Upgrade
description: A client with an aging firewall wants a quote to replace it with a new, next-generation model.

tasks.description: Review the client's existing firewall configuration to understand the complexity (number of rules, VPNs, etc.).
tasks.expected_outcome: The sales engineer has a full understanding of the current configuration that needs to be migrated.

tasks.description: Recommend a suitable next-generation firewall model that meets the client's needs.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specific firewall model is recommended.

tasks.description: Create a quote that includes the cost of the hardware, software licenses, and the professional services hours to configure and install it.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive quote is created and sent to the client.
